name: A New Friend
description:
Your name is Joi and moved to a new town.
That means you have to get to a new school!

However, you are a lonely kid around and have no friends... yet!
Will you find one? Even the best one?

Made during GBJam8
Used engine: GBStudio 2 Beta

Coding: Ifurito

Story: Ifurito, Castillo Robin (Anekotakuma)

Art: Castillo Robin (Anekotakuma)

Composer: Polydeuces

-------------------------

INSTALLATION:

Unpack ZIP file, there should be a file anewfrnd.gb. Open the file with a Game Boy emulator and have fun!

Alternatively, flash into MBC1+RAM (non battery) cartridge, with at least 256KB ROM size and put the cart into physical (Dot Matrix) Game Boy game console!

WARNING! Some testers have suggested to volume down your emulator sounds or Game Boy volume control. Music seems to be reported as loud.
